author: Sam Apple
title: How Un-Miracle Drugs Could Help Tame the Pandemic
description: Scientists are scrambling to create Covid-19 antivirals. But what if medicines we already have are good enough to buy patients more time?
content: In the 19th century, when infectious diseases remained mysterious, doctors could do little more than tend to the soil. To fend off infections, people were told to keep sanitary conditions, to follow proper nutrition. But by the early 20th century, a new metap… [+3364 chars]
